name: Cream Cheese Strawberry Braided Pastry
instructions: Preheat the oven to 200°C (390°F).
Mix cream cheese, powdered sugar, and vanilla extract in a bowl; set aside.
Roll out the puff pastry to a 12 x 6-inch rectangle and place it on parchment paper.
Mark 1.5 inches from both edges lengthwise and cut off the corners.
Spread the cream cheese mixture down the center, followed by the strawberry jam.
Cut slanting strips on both sides of the pastry and fold the top and bottom edges over the filling.
Braid the pastry by overlapping the strips over the filling.
Transfer to a baking tray, brush with beaten egg, and bake for 20-25 minutes until golden brown.
Let cool for at least 10 minutes before serving.

name: Eggless Jam Thumbprint Cookies
instructions: Preheat the oven to 170°C (340°F).
Sift flour, cornstarch, salt, and baking powder together.
Cream butter and sugar until smooth, then add vanilla extract.
Gradually mix in the dry ingredients to form a dough.
Chill the dough in the refrigerator for 2 hours.
Roll into 1 tbsp-sized balls and place them on a baking sheet.
Press a thumb or spoon in the center to create an indentation.
Fill with 1/2 tsp jam (avoid overfilling).
Bake for 12-14 minutes and let cool completely before storing.

name: Grandma’s Secret Brownies
instructions: Preheat the oven to 175°C (350°F) and grease a baking pan.
Mix melted butter, granulated sugar, and brown sugar until combined.
Whisk in eggs and vanilla extract.
Sift in flour, cocoa powder, salt, and baking powder, then fold into the batter.
Stir in chocolate chips.
Pour batter into the baking pan and spread evenly.
Bake for 25-30 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out with moist crumbs.
Let cool before cutting into squares.

name: Classic Margherita Pizza
instructions: Combine flour, salt, sugar, and yeast in a bowl.
Add warm water and olive oil, then knead until smooth.
Cover and let the dough rise for 1 hour.
Preheat oven to 220°C (425°F).
Roll out the dough into a pizza shape.
Spread tomato sauce evenly over the dough.
Top with mozzarella cheese and fresh basil leaves.
Bake for 12-15 minutes or until golden and bubbly.

name: Spicy Chicken Tikka
instructions: Mix yogurt, lemon juice, ginger-garlic paste, and spices in a bowl.
Add chicken pieces and marinate for at least 1 hour.
Preheat grill or oven to 200°C (400°F).
Thread chicken onto skewers and brush with oil.
Grill for 15-20 minutes, turning occasionally until fully cooked.
Serve hot with chutney or naan.
